state.text:
Hook up the 3D perspective camera you wish to use to 'Render segmented'. A screen space camera is automatically supplied by this sequence. Then paste the material you want to render in Root\Render segmented\Y Loop\X Loop\Scene.

Hook up the supplied 3D perspective and / or screen space camera and time inputs as appropriate.

When 'Preview' is On, the material pasted in Scene is rendered in real time to the view, with aspect ratio adjusted to match the supplied 'Width' and 'Height', witch is the resolution the output will be rendered to. This resolution can be scaled by an arbitrary integer factor to switch between quick / draft rendering.

When 'Preview' is Off, (Width / Segment size) * (Height / Segment) size tiles will be transmitted to the specified framedump server whenever the 'Render!' button is clicked.
